LanguageData.VME_NeedSweets.stages.0.label: craving dessert
LanguageData.VME_NeedSweets.stages.0.description: I'm craving some sweet food badly... I feel so tired... this is ridiculous, I’d do just about anything for a single sprinkle.
LanguageData.VME_NeedSweets.stages.1.label: desiring dessert
LanguageData.VME_NeedSweets.stages.1.description: I haven't had a sweet treat in a while now. Is a chocolate bar or piece of cake too much to ask for?
LanguageData.VME_NeedSweets.stages.2.label: wanting dessert
LanguageData.VME_NeedSweets.stages.2.description: How about some dessert? It has been a while...
LanguageData.VME_NeedSweets.stages.3.label: full
LanguageData.VME_NeedSweets.stages.3.description: I've recently eaten some dessert, it was amazing.
LanguageData.VME_NeedSweets.stages.4.label: completely full
LanguageData.VME_NeedSweets.stages.4.description: I'm in heaven. Sweet, greasy, delicious heaven.
